For the fastest way we can do this, to bypass the 7 day trade lock that steam implemented. First i will have to ask for your trade link in order for me to change my trade link with your trade link to my "Bitskins" account. Afterwards you will be sending me a steam offer for your items that we discussed, and as soon as I see the trade/steam offer, I will check out the item right away from Bitskins. After which, a trade offer will come to your steam account containing the item you requested, after you got the trade offer from the (Bitskins Bot), that's the time i am going to accept your trade offer for the exchange and get done in our deal/trade. This trade method is made to bypass the 7 day thing. I hope it's clear with you.
